sentences: Ookeani pind on maailma suurim veekogu.
context: In Estonian, 'ookeani' is the genitive case form of the word 'ookean', meaning 'ocean'. The genitive case indicates possession or relationship. So 'ookeani' can be translated as 'of the ocean' or possessive forms like 'the ocean's'. For example, 'maailma ookeani pind' means 'the surface of the world's ocean'.
